original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Opammakathāpañha
analyzed: opamma kathā pañha

original: Sīhavagga
analyzed: sīha vagga

original: 9. Sappaṅgapañha
analyzed: sappaṅga pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘sappassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena sappassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, sappo urena gacchati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja sappaḥ urena gacchati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena paññāya caritabbaṁ, paññāya caramānassa kho, mahārāja, yogino cittaṁ ñāye carati, vilakkhaṇaṁ vivajjeti, salakkhaṇaṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena paññāya caritabba paññāya caramānassa kho mahā rāja yogino cittam ñāye carati vilakkhaṇam vivajjeti salakkhaṇam bhāveti

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, sappassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja sappassa paṭhamam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, sappo caramāno osadhaṁ parivajjento carati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja sappaḥ caramānaḥ osadham parivajjentaḥ carati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena duccaritaṁ parivajjentena caritabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena duccaritam parivajjentena

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, sappassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja sappassa dutiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, sappo manusse disvā tappati socati cintayati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja sappaḥ manusse disvā tappati socati cintayati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kuvitakke, vitakketvā aratiṁ uppādayitvā
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena ku vitakke vitakketvā aratim uppādayitvā

original: tappitabbaṁ socitabbaṁ cintayitabbaṁ ‘pamādena me divaso vītināmito, na so puna sakkā laddhun’ti.
analyzed: tappitabbam socitabbam cintayitabbam pamādena me divasaḥ vītināmitaḥ na saḥ puna sakkā laddhunti

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, sappassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja sappassa tatiyam aṅgam gahetabba

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā bhallāṭiyajātake dvinnaṁ kinnarānaṁ—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā bhallāṭiya jātake dvinnam

original: ‘Mayekarattaṁ vippavasimha ludda,
analyzed: mayā eka rattam vippavasimha ludda

original: Akāmakā aññamaññaṁ sarantā;
analyzed: akāmakā aññamaññam sarantā

original: Tamekarattaṁ anutappamānā,
analyzed: tam eka rattam anutappamānā

original: Socāmasā ratti puna na hessatī’”ti.
analyzed: socāmasā ratti puna na hessati iti

original: Sappaṅgapañho navamo.
analyzed: sappaṅga pañhaḥ navamaḥ
